WorkItem.Description:
PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5 is currently operating with a maximum record size of 2080 bytes in the sheet stream, the old value for BIFF5.
Â 
BIFF8 maximum record size is 8224 bytes. It might as well make use of full record size, mostly for cosmetic reasons.
WorkItem.Summary: Merged cells record, write to full record size in PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5
